I'd like to get the input from everyone on issues regarding URL structure
choices for REST-based systems.  What are the pros and cons of the following
different sets of URLs:

	http://www.foo.com/users/
	http://www.foo.com/users/john-smith/
	http://www.foo.com/users/john-smith/cell-phone/

Vs.
	http://www.foo.com/?section=users
	http://www.foo.com/?section=users&user=john-smith
	http://www.foo.com/?section=users&user=john-smith&phone=cell-phone

I'm looking to create an exhaustive list of pros & cons.

Thanks in advance for the help.
